summary: Have you realized that many creatures are immune to paralysis ? doesn't that suck you use paralysis power (once a day) and the creature and it has no effect on it ? if you think so this mod is for you
descriptionHtml:
This mod helps you to paralysis every creature like : mammoths , horses , wisps and so on . you cannot paralysis dragons thou :|
this is the first mod I've ever made so don't go so hard on me . and sorry for my bad English
author: mksun
